column4: from backend import db;from cruds.crud_course_section_students.models import CourseSectionStudents;from cruds.crud_users.models import Users;course_section_students = CourseSectionStudents.query.filter_by(course_section_id=$, status=1);users = [Users.query.get(course_section_student.user_id) for course_section_student in course_section_students]
